name: Stupid Cars Meta Quest
summary:
These drivers are, you guessed it… STUPID!
They need your help. Using Hand Tracking or Controllers, select their vehicles to change speed and guide them as they merge into the flow of traffic. But be careful, these cars can’t stop… if there’s a collision, it’s all over.
Perfect for casual players, but also offering optional challenges for the purists. Adjustable playing position to get you right down into the action and, for a more immersive experience, try Mixed Reality Mode.
Designed to be one of the most challenging "One More Go" games around, it features.
